name: No Signal (itch) (A Plat on crack)
description:
This fun little game was the winner of the 12-hour Ytech  Hackaton 2022.  The participants had to develop a game with a free theme and using any GameEngine and platform. 

In this game, the player controls the movement of a padel ball that was tapped so hard that it reached space. The main goal is to endure against hordes of enemies (Ytech staff members) in an endless run. There are two entities that influence the controls: one changes the speed of the ball, and the other increases the radius of the circular movement. 

I invite you to downlaod (it only takes 5 seconds) and beat my highscore of 1min32secs. ENJOY the frenzy!
